itemDesc: An anti-aircraft flak cannon repurposed as a defensive emplacement against infantry.
This heavy artillery cannon is designed to cripple enemy fortifcations from an entrenched position. Its long heavy barrel gives the "Thunderbolt" outstanding range.
A defensive emplacement against heavily armored vehicles.

A simple mine that is placed under terrain and fitted with a pressure-sensitive plate to detonate under the weight of heavy vehicles. Mines are visible to friendlies and enemies on foot and deactivate after 48 in-game days.
This heavy-duty explosive device is designed to deal significant damage to structures and stationary vehicles.
A pallet of Barbed Wire that's used for the construction of frontline defenses.
Attached to the barrel of a rifle, this short blade can spear enemies in close quarters encounters.
A portable device that mixes various materials to form Concrete, which are used to build heavily fortified structures.
Anti-infantry minefield that deliver a fatal payload to unsuspecting soldiers. Placed over a large area.

The E680-S Rudder Lock is a Colonial Sea Mine, which is a Large Item Explosive Charge that is primarily used against underwater naval vehicles, such as Submarines. In order to be deployed, it must be primed to explode at a certain depth.

It is deployed by hand on the ground, requires the deployment of a Havoc Charge Detonator, and must be shot by friendly small arms to detonate.The explosion deals 1850 Demolition damage in a 6m radius and quickly decreasing amounts in a 7m radius..
The Havoc Charge Detonator is a Large Item that serves as the detonator for the Havoc Charge.
A heavy cannon designed to shatter the garrisons and fortifications of advancing forces. The Exalt is best utilized when placed into a defensive position to take advantage of its impressive range.
A light artillery cannon designed to be a fixture in defensive fortifications. The Lariat sports a formidable long-range 120mm cannon designed to put immense pressure on the enemy infantry.

This unique demolotion tool is a long, metal tube packed with explosives. The Hydra's Whisper is designed to destroy out-of-reach movement impairing structures and detonate any mines along the length of the tube.
damageDesc: Destroys obstacles that can otherwise only be dismantled with Wrenches

itemDesc: A pallet of Metal Beams that's used for the construction of frontline defenses.
A container that can carry large quantities of resources and can be transported by certain vehicles.
A booster engine that provides thrust for launching ballistic rockets to long distant targets.
A pallet of sandbags that's used for the construction of frontline defenses.
A container for shipping very large quantities of Crates using Crane loaded vehicles. This type of container can only be unloaded at Storage Depots and Seaports.
A container for shipping large quantities of Crates using Crane loaded vehicles. This type of container can be unloaded from any location.
